column4: have a problem after upgrading from intrepid to jaunty.  Boot to single-mode is fine.  normal boot puts garbage on video and makes keyboard / mouse completely frozen.  Can't switch to console.  Can ssh in.
what graphics card do you have?
did you have ATI's drivers installed before?
you don't want ATI's drivers, they aren't supported for your card on Jaunty
you want the open source driver
is there an apt-get install I should run to do that?
my mistake it is actually sudo apt-get remove xorg-driver-fglrx
going across the room to check it now.  Logon window looks awesome!
thanks so much.  Even dual monitors are working!
